case.title: If You Are Really Ready for a Relationship, Email Me
case.text:
GENUINE, OLD-FASHIONED GIRL: Beautiful, smart, and self-made.
30s and tall.
Pretty girl.
Looking for someone mature, fit, stable, and not into playing any games
I WILL NOT MISREPRESENT MYSELF AND EXPECT SAME FROM GUY
NO GAMES, NO STRANGE STUFF, NO SEXUAL HANGUPS OR FETISHES, NO WEIRD STUFF, and NO GUYS NOT READY FOR A REAL RELATIONSHIP
WE CAN SEE IF WE CONNECT AND HAVE A GOOD OLD FASHIONED ROMANCE
I have pictures and you should too
